title: Democrats Spent $2 Trillion to Save the Economy. They Don’t Want to Talk About It.
description: Polls show voters liked direct payments from President Biden’s 2021 economic rescue bill. But they have become fodder for Republican inflation attacks.
dc:creator: Jim Tankersley
media:credit: Stefani Reynolds for The New York Times
media:description: A signing ceremony for the American Rescue Plan last year on Capitol Hill. The pandemic aid has largely vanished from stump speeches or campaign ads.
